about_the_game:
[MIKO x MIKO SISTERS: The Kagura Shrine Maidens and the Evil Spirit] is a visual novel where Akira, on a solo journey, finds himself possessed by a mischievous spirit after an encounter at an old shrine. To rid himself of the spirit, he ends up living under the same roof as two shrine maiden sisters. As the spirit's influence causes strange changes in his body, Aki must navigate this peculiar new life while seeking a way to break free…

◆Story

The protagonist, Akira Yamanabe, embarks on a solo journey to mark his graduation from university.

Along the way, he stumbles upon an eerily decrepit shrine and discovers a mysterious object covered in talismans.

At that very moment, the shrine’s priestesses, Hazuki and Uzuki Kagura, appear.

Mistaking Akira for a thief, Hazuki hurls the mysterious object at him, knocking him unconscious in his escape attempt.

At the exact moment the mysterious object struck him, Akira found himself possessed by a mischievous spirit that had been sealed within it.

From that day forward, Akira begins hearing the spirit's voice, notices his right arm discoloring, and finds himself unintentionally scaring people from the shadows.

As they search for a way to perform the exorcism, can they ultimately succeed in banishing the mischievous spirit…?

◆Characters

・Hazuki Kagura

Warm-hearted and energetic, yet often prone to overdoing things, Hazuki is the older of the Kagura sisters.

She is the one responsible for throwing the mysterious object that caused the evil spirit to possess Akira.

While she possesses powerful spiritual abilities, she struggles to use them effectively.

・Uzuki Kagura

Gentle and shy, Uzuki is the younger of the Kagura sisters.

Her timid nature leads her to avoid Akira, making it difficult for her to connect with him.

Though she lacks the powerful spiritual abilities of her sister, her extensive knowledge allows her to effectively support Hazuki.

・Akira Yamanabe

Embarking on a solo journey under the guise of post-graduation exploration,

Akira Yamanabe is, in truth, seeking himself after a string of failed job applications.

Led by a stray dog, he stumbles upon a shrine, only to have the misfortune of becoming possessed by a mischievous spirit.

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game contain comical text kicking animals, text suggesting sexual acts such as child bearing, text suggesting fantastical violence, and mild sexual content. This content is not intended for children or persons of any age.
